title: FLAIR #2: textural and temporal information for semantic segmentation from multi-source optical imagery. (arXiv:2305.14467v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: The FLAIR #2 dataset hereby presented includes two very distinct types of data, which are exploited for a semantic segmentation task aimed at mapping land cover. The data fusion workflow proposes the exploitation of the fine spatial and textural information of very high spatial resolution (VHR) mono-temporal aerial imagery and the temporal and spectral richness of high spatial resolution (HR) time series of Copernicus Sentinel-2 satellite images. The French National Institute of Geographical and Forest Information (IGN), in response to the growing availability of high-quality Earth Observation (EO) data, is actively exploring innovative strategies to integrate these data with heterogeneous characteristics. IGN is therefore offering this dataset to promote innovation and improve our knowledge of our territories.
context:
Title: FLAIR #2: textural and temporal information for semantic segmentation from multi-source optical imagery. (arXiv:2305.14467v1 [cs.CV])
Abstract: The FLAIR #2 dataset hereby presented includes two very distinct types of data, which are exploited for a semantic segmentation task aimed at mapping land cover. The data fusion workflow proposes the exploitation of the fine spatial and textural information of very high spatial resolution (VHR) mono-temporal aerial imagery and the temporal and spectral richness of high spatial resolution (HR) time series of Copernicus Sentinel-2 satellite images. The French National Institute of Geographical and Forest Information (IGN), in response to the growing availability of high-quality Earth Observation (EO) data, is actively exploring innovative strategies to integrate these data with heterogeneous characteristics. IGN is therefore offering this dataset to promote innovation and improve our knowledge of our territories.
translated_title: FLAIR #2：来自多源光学图像的纹理和时间信息用于语义分割
translated_abstract: FLAIR#2数据集包括两种非常不同的数据类型，这些数据类型用于语义分割任务，目的是绘制土地覆盖图。数据融合工作流程提出了利用超高空间分辨率（VHR）单时相航空图像的良好空间和纹理信息以及Copernicus Sentinel-2卫星图像的时间和光谱丰富性。随着高质量地球观测（EO）数据的不断增加，法国地理和森林信息国家研究所（IGN）正在积极探索将这些特征异质的数据与数据集成的创新策略。IGN因此提供了此数据集，以促进创新并提高我们对领土的认识。
tldr: FLAIR#2数据集将超高空间分辨率的单时相航空图像和Copernicus Sentinel-2卫星图像的时间和光谱信息进行融合，用于语义分割，以提高我们对领土的认识和推动创新。
